summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Howard Avenue North from East Newton Street to the North line of Green Addition, et al., in the City of Seattle., by constructing watermains under Ordinance No. 22480, creating Local Improvement District No. 2214 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
